mapper.sql: CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_CODE, CHANNEL_NAME, CHANNEL_TYPE, CHANNEL_DESCRIBE, CHANNEL_ICON, CHANNEL_STATUS, USERID, ADDTIME, AUDITID, AUDITTIME, CHANNEL_APPKEY

CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_CODE, CHANNEL_NAME, (select aaa103 from v_aa10 t where t.aaa100='CHANNEL_TYPE' AND aaa102=CHANNEL_TYPE) CHANNEL_TYPE, CHANNEL_DESCRIBE, CHANNEL_ICON, CHANNEL_STATUS, USERID, ADDTIME, AUDITID, AUDITTIME,CHANNEL_APPKEY
mapper.select:
select
from SYS_API_CHANNEL
and CHANNEL_NAME like '%'||#{channelName}||'%'
and CHANNEL_TYPE in
#{item}
and CHANNEL_STATUS in
#{item}
order by ADDTIME desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT sys_guid() from dual
insert into SYS_API_CHANNEL (CHANNEL_ID, CHANNEL_CODE, CHANNEL_NAME, CHANNEL_TYPE, CHANNEL_DESCRIBE, CHANNEL_ICON, CHANNEL_STATUS, USERID, ADDTIME, AUDITID, AUDITTIME, CHANNEL_APPKEY ) values (#{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{auditid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audittime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{channelAppkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT sys_guid() from dual

CHANNEL_ID,

mapper.update:
update SYS_API_CHANNEL
CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_DESCRIBE = #{channelDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ICON = #{channelIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_STATUS = #{channelStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE},
AUDITID = #{auditid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=DATE},
CHANNEL_APPKEY = #{channelAppkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_API_CHANNEL set CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_DESCRIBE = #{channelDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ICON = #{channelIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_STATUS = #{channelStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE}, AUDITID = #{auditid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=DATE}, CHANNEL_APPKEY = #{channelAppkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select code_value id, code_name name, a.par_code_value pid, decode(sign((select count(*) from sys_api_channel_interface t where t.channel_id = #{channelid} and t.interface_id = a.code_value)), '1', 'true', 'false') checked from code_value a where a.code_type = 'INTERFACE_TYPE' union all select interface_id id, interface_name ||'('|| interface_url||')' name , interface_detail_type pid, decode(sign((select count(*) from sys_api_channel_interface t where t.channel_id = #{channelid} and t.interface_id = a.interface_id)), '1', 'true', 'false') checked from sys_api_interface a
mapper.delete: delete from SYS_API_CHANNEL_INTERFACE t where t.CHANNEL_ID=#{CHANNEL_ID}
